body_html: What exactly needs to be done to add GPU support for other platforms? Our users wish to use Tensorflow on the Cray XK7 nodes (which have Tesla K20s). It seems to be linking a lot of executables that don't seem to be built with the bazel build, like ops_gen.
body_text: What exactly needs to be done to add GPU support for other platforms? Our users wish to use Tensorflow on the Cray XK7 nodes (which have Tesla K20s). It seems to be linking a lot of executables that don't seem to be built with the bazel build, like ops_gen.
body: What exactly needs to be done to add GPU support for other platforms? Our users wish to use Tensorflow on the Cray XK7 nodes (which have Tesla K20s). It seems to be linking a lot of executables that don't seem to be built with the bazel build, like *_ops_gen_*.
